attributes.action: Change car tax based on the cars actual co emissions, not the made up ones!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that the car tax system should be changed to the actual co emission reading taken when its mot'd. Its all computerised now so they know exactly what cars are causing the high emissions, and it's totally wrong to go purely on the engine size, its also how the driver uses the car. 
I have owned a BMW 318 for that last 4 years and every year it registers <100 on the Co emissions test, and yet I have to pay £190 because of the engine size! Its wrong, and they know it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
